metadata.Title: CVE-2015-9101 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description:
The fill_buffer_resample function in util.c in libmp3lame.a in LAME 3.98.4,3.98.2, 3.98, 3.99, 3.99.1, 3.99.2, 3.99.3, 3.99.4 and 3.99.5 allows remoteattackers to cause a denial of service (heap-based buffer over-read andapplication crash) via a crafted audio file.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-9101` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

lame - 3.99.5+repack1-9build1
libmp3lame0 - 3.99.5+repack1-9build1
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: lame package in esm-infra/bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.99.5+repack1-9build1').
